ModMetaData.name: Rim-Effect: Music
ModMetaData.author: Vanilla Expanded Team and Co.
ModMetaData.description:
Rim Effect: Music features 60 tracks from Mass Effect, Mass Effect 2 and Mass Effect 3. The music has been sorted to play in specific scenarios - combat oriented music will play when threats are present, while the environmental, ambient music will play in calm periods of your game.
All credits and copyrights go to Electronic Arts, Bioware as well as the composers of the original Mass Effect OST: Jack Wall, Sam Hulick, Richard Jacques, David Kates, Clint Mansell, Christopher Lennertz, Cris Velasco, and Sascha Dikiciyan.
We (authors) do not claim any ownership of these music tracks.
